fiber_request = state_change['object']
 portal = state_change.getPortal()
 support = portal.WebSite_getSupportEntity()
 
 if fiber_request.getGenderValue() is None:
 raise ValueError, "Gender must be set"
 
 #We get notification message as text of email
 notification_reference = 'vifib.fiber-request.confirm'
 notification_message = context.NotificationTool_getDocumentValue(notification_reference,language=fiber_request.getLanguage())
 mapping_dict = {'customer_name':fiber_request.getTitle()}
 mail_text = notification_message.asText(
 substitution_method_parameter_dict={'mapping_dict':mapping_dict})
 mail_title = notification_message.getTitle()
 mail_format = notification_message.getTextFormat()
 
 
 #We get notification message as contract
 notification_reference = 'vifib.fiber-hosting.contract'
 notification_message = context.NotificationTool_getDocumentValue(notification_reference, fiber_request.getLanguage())
 
 #the method asText except AttributeError and so we can send pdf with error. 
 #We simulate the generation of it to bu sure we don't get error
 method_id = notification_message.getTextContentSubstitutionMappingMethodId()
 if method_id:
 mapping = getattr(fiber_request,method_id)(fiber_request=fiber_request)
 
 
 contract_text = notification_message.asText(
 substitution_method_parameter_dict={'fiber_request':fiber_request})
 
 #create temp document to generate a pdf
 
 # Generate the pdf data
 module = portal.getDefaultModule(portal_type='Web Page')
 
 # Generate the pdf data
 pdf_data = module.newContent(portal_type="Web Page",
 temp_object= 1,
 text_format = notification_message.getTextFormat())
 
 # Build the text and save it
 if pdf_data.getTextFormat() == 'text/html':
 text_content = '<html><body>%s</body></html>' % contract_text
 else:
 text_content = contract_text
 pdf_data.setTextContent(text_content)
 
 # Create the pdf document in the mode
 #TODO : use ingestion_tool instead of
 module = portal.getDefaultModule(portal_type='PDF')
 pdf = module.newContent(
 portal_type='PDF',
 data=str(pdf_data.convert(format='pdf')[1]),
 content_type='application/pdf'
 )
 pdf.setFollowUpValue(fiber_request)
 pdf.setReference('%s-%s.pdf' % (notification_reference,fiber_request.getId()))
 pdf.share()
 pdf.archive()
 
 
 #Create new mail message event
 portal.portal_notifications.sendMessage(
 sender=support,
 recipient=(fiber_request, ),
 subject=mail_title,
 attachment_document_list=(pdf, ),

 )
